alert.note: Alert for Jewell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 19 at 2:14PM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ....Areas of Freezing Drizzle Causing Slick Spots on Local Roads... Areas of light freezing drizzle will linger through the afternoon, especially along and east of Highway 281. This will cause localized slick spots on roads, bridges or untreated surfaces. Through 4 PM, some of the more consistent freezing drizzle will move through the Highway 6 and Interstate 80 corridors along and east of Hastings and Grand Island. Late afternoon commuters should be particularly aware of the potential for icy spots on roads. Slow down if you plan to travel into the early evening hours. The freezing drizzle should end by early evening.
